title.rendered: Google’s Gboard and other good keyboards for your Android mobile

content.rendered:
Using the keyboard of your smartphone is as simple as pressing somewhere where you can write text, and it will appear on the screen. Each manufacturer of phones compatible with Google’s operating system has its own, but it is always better if we have a choice. If you were looking to give your phone a change or want to try a new keyboard, we recommend some very interesting options right below.

gboard

Although there are very good alternatives and options within Android keyboards, it would be unfair not to say that Gboard is possibly the best option. This Google keyboard has everything you could ask for in a mobile keyboard, and much more.

This keyboard has many customization options and is also quite comfortable. We will find its best and greatest asset in the predictive ability of your keyboard, which works incredibly well and is very accurate. It also has a very good autocorrect similar to Gmail.

In addition, Gboard has some more “advanced” elements such as the possibility of configuring the keyboard to be used with one hand, or setting the number line so that it is always visible. It also has a very good writing swipe or with dictation on the fly.

SwiftKey

Another great option that we have within this sector is Microsoft’s SwiftKey. This keyboard is another option that works very well with predictive writing, since it will quickly learn our writing style to make our work easier and make us write much faster.

This keyboard also includes a large number of customization options with which we can change our style from time to time. It also has a fairly large variety of emojis and allows searching for GIFs.

One of the best features that it has is going to be found in its translator, which will allow us to translate any text that we are writing into another language in real time. The keyboard supports up to 400 languagesSo we won’t have a problem with that.

Fonts

With Fonts we bring you a quite original keyboard alternative that is far removed from the experience offered by the two previous options. This keyboard allows us change our writing font among a huge number of possibilities.

It is true that in terms of functionality, Fonts can be somewhat more limited. However, this keyboard It is compatible with applications of all kindssuch as Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, Messenger, Telegram, TikTok, WhatsApp, Twitch and Discord, among others.

LED keyboard

If more than functionalities what you are looking for is design, the Led Keyboard is a great option for you. This keyboard in question has more customization options than the previous ones on the listwith some very colorful ones that even imitate the RGB that have become so fashionable today.

Although its greatest virtue is there, it is also quite useful to improve the speed of our writing. It’s a fast keyboard allows you to write by sliding your finger, in addition to having automatic correction and word suggestions. It is free, although when we change the style we will have to “swallow” some advertising.

Minimum

Minuum also stands out a bit from the more “conventional” options by offering a different user interface. The keyboard allows us to configure practically any aspect of the keyboard, such as the sound they make when typing or the size of the keys.

It is compatible with a good number of languages ​​where Spanish is found, and it contains a very good predictive level that even includes the ñ despite the fact that it does not appear on the keyboard. The only problem with Minuum is that it is a payment option, but it offers 30 days free trial.

fleksy

Another very good option to choose is undoubtedly Fleksy. This keyboard features a very clean and clear user interfaceand features swipe writing that even lets you delete words or insert spaces with gestures.

In addition, Fleksy will also allow us to choose other options for our keyboard such as the size of the keyboard (it has 6 available) or the sound. As a curiosity, this keyboard Fleksy tHe holds the Guinness World Record for the fastest keyboard.

Simple Keyboard

We close the list with a keyboard that is perfect for those who want something different, but that is simple and no frills. Simple Keyboard does exactly what its name promises, no more, no less.

If your mobile is relatively modern, perhaps it is better that you opt for one of the options above. However, this Simple Keyboard is a perfect option for less powerful mobiles, since it hardly consumes resources and it is very simple to use.
